Name: Fallstreak: Requiem for my Homeland
About the game: A world blanketed by everfalling ash. Humanity faces its inevitable end due to the Convergence of the Aukeran Sea and twelve otherworldly Calamities. This is the story of Velour Two-Six, a child soldier in a land ravaged by war over the time that remains. Fallstreak: Requiem for my Homeland is a linear kinetic visual novel that utilizes high-quality graphics, music, and storytelling to create an immersive narrative experience. Scenario: Centi Character Art: Rimuu Background Art: Ariangga Music: JadeVater Logo/UI: Kathaeris
